name: Pinfall
description:
Become ever more unstable in Pin Fall, a new game that's all the "rage" right now!

How fast can you get Pinny the Pinball out of the trough and back to the shooter lane?

Controls

  • Click and drag to shoot
  •  "R" to reset
  •  "Q" to quit

Speedrun timers are on the bottom right of the screen and the current score is on the bottom left!

Happy shooting!
